properties.body:
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 180259Z OCT
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 FIVE MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   20-47.14S 039-21.98W, 20-03.20S 039-21.88W,
   20-03.43S 038-25.35W, 20-11.32S 038-03.58W,
   20-27.28S 038-03.58W, 20-26.26S 038-10.01W,
   20-27.67S 038-11.40W, 20-31.44S 038-11.28W,
   20-36.34S 038-08.37W, 20-39.76S 038-08.63W,
   20-42.75S 038-11.13W, 20-47.15S 038-13.06W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2376/14.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 180359Z OCT 14.
